mapper.sql: WHERE A.VACANCY_STS_CD = 'VCS0000000001' AND A.JC_AGREE_STS_CD = 'JAS0000000001' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND (A.VACANCY_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR A.VACANCY_KEYWORD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CPES_ISCO_CD WHERE ISCO_CD = A.ISCO_CD AND (KH_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR EN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%')) ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CPES_COMPNY WHERE COMPNY_SEQ = A.COMPNY_SEQ AND (COMPNY_NM_KH LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR COMPNY_NM_EN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%')) ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CPES_LOC_CD X1 INNER JOIN CPES_VACANCY_LOC X2 ON X2.ADDR_CD = X1.LVL_CD WHERE X2.VACANCY_SEQ = A.VACANCY_SEQ AND (X1.NM_KH LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR X1.NM_EN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%')) ))
mapper.select: /*integrated.selectIntegratedSearchVacancyListCnt*/ SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_VACANCY A INNER JOIN CPES_COMPNY B ON B.COMPNY_SEQ = A.COMPNY_SEQ

/*integrated.selectIntegratedSearchVacancyListCnt*/ SELECT A.VACANCY_SEQ , A.VACANCY_TITLE , A.RECRUMT_MEMB , A.MIN_SALARY_AMT , A.MAX_SALARY_AMT , A.VACANCY_STS_CD , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.BGN_DT, #{langCd}) AS BGN_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.END_DT, #{langCd}) AS END_DT , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('EMPLOY_FORM_CD', A.EMPLOY_FORM_CD, #{langCd}) AS EMPLOY_FORM_NM , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('VACANCY_STS_CD', A.VACANCY_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS VACANCY_STS_NM , FN_GET_REMAIN_CNT(A.END_DT) AS REMAIN_DT , FN_GET_REMAIN_DIV(A.END_DT) AS REMAIN_DIV , FN_GET_NEW_YN(A.REG_DT) AS NEW_YN , FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{condUserSeq}, 'BCT0000000003', A.VACANCY_SEQ) AS BKMK_SEQ , A.BKMK_CNT , ( SELECT FN_GET_ADDR_NM(SUBSTR(ADDR_FULL_CD,1,3), '2', #{langCd}) AS ADDR_NM FROM CPES_VACANCY_LOC WHERE VACANCY_SEQ = A.VACANCY_SEQ LIMIT 1 ) AS ADDR_NM , CASE WHEN UPPER(#{langCd}) = 'KH' THEN B.COMPNY_NM_KH ELSE B.COMPNY_NM_EN END COMPNY_NM , FN_GET_FILE_PATH(B.LOGO_FILE_GRP_SEQ) AS FILE_PATH FROM CPES_VACANCY A INNER JOIN CPES_COMPNY B ON B.COMPNY_SEQ = A.COMPNY_SEQ AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
mapper.sql: WHERE A.RESUME_STS_CD = 'RSS0000000002' AND A.JC_AGREE_STS_CD = 'JAS0000000001' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ( A.RESUME_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR A.RESUME_KEYWORD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR B.ADDR_FULL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CPES_ISCO_CD X1 INNER JOIN CPES_RESUME_ISCO X2 ON X2.ISCO_CD = X1.ISCO_CD WHERE X2.RESUME_SEQ = A.RESUME_SEQ AND (X1.KH_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR X1.EN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%')) ) )
mapper.select: /*integrated.selectIntegratedSearchVacancyListCnt*/ SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_RESUME A INNER JOIN CPES_USER B ON B.USER_SEQ = A.USER_SEQ

/*integrated.selectIntegratedSearchVacancyListCnt*/ SELECT A.RESUME_SEQ , A.RESUME_TITLE , A.EXPCT_MIN_SALARY_AMT , A.EXPCT_MAX_SALARY_AMT , A.PREFER_EMPLOY_TYPE_CD , A.PREFER_CRTCT_TYPE , A.TOT_CAREER_TERM_YEAR_CNT , A.TOT_CAREER_TERM_MONTH_CNT , A.DISABL_YN , A.RET_MIGRAT_YN , A.CAREER_YN , FN_GET_FILE_PATH(A.FILE_GRP_SEQ) AS FILE_PATH , FN_GET_NEW_YN(A.REG_DT) AS NEW_YN , DATE_FORMAT(A.MOD_DT, '%d/%m') AS MOD_DT , FN_GET_USER_NM_BY_USER_SEQ(B.USER_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS USER_NM , FN_GET_USER_AGE(B.BIRTH) AS AGE , FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{condUserSeq}, 'BCT0000000006', A.RESUME_SEQ) AS BKMK_SEQ , ( SELECT FN_GET_COMMON_NM('EDU_DEGREE_CD', EDU_DEGREE_CD, #{langCd}) FROM CPES_RESUME_GENRL_EDU WHERE RESUME_SEQ = A.RESUME_SEQ LIMIT 1 ) AS EDU_DEGREE_NM , ( SELECT FN_GET_ISCO_NM(ISCO_CD, #{langCd}) FROM CPES_RESUME_ISCO WHERE RESUME_SEQ = A.RESUME_SEQ LIMIT 1 ) AS ISCO_CD_LIST_STR , B.GENDER_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('GENDER_CD', B.GENDER_CD, #{langCd}) AS GENDER_NM , FN_GET_ADDR_NM(SUBSTR(B.ADDR_FULL_CD,1,3), '2', #{langCd}) AS ADDR_NM FROM CPES_RESUME A INNER JOIN CPES_USER B ON B.USER_SEQ = A.USER_SEQ AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
mapper.sql: WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND ( A.FAIR_NM_KH LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR A.FAIR_NM_EN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR A.FAIR_KEYWORD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CPES_LOC_CD WHERE LVL_CD = A.ADDR_CD AND (NM_KH LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR NM_EN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%')) ) )
mapper.select:
/*integrated.selectIntegratedSearchJobFairList*/ SELECT A.FAIR_SEQ , FN_GET_FAIR_NM(A.FAIR_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_NM , A.FAIR_DIV_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('FAIR_DIV_CD', A.FAIR_DIV_CD, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_DIV_NM , CONCAT(FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.FAIR_BGN_DT,#{langCd}),' ',A.FAIR_BGN_HOUR,':',A.FAIR_BGN_MINUTE,' ',A.FAIR_BGN_AMPM) AS FAIR_BGN_DT , CONCAT(FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.FAIR_END_DT,#{langCd}),' ',A.FAIR_END_HOUR,':',A.FAIR_END_MINUTE,' ',A.FAIR_END_AMPM) AS FAIR_END_DT , A.TEL1 , A.TEL2 , A.EMAIL , FN_GET_FILE_PATH(A.THUMB_FILE_GRP_SEQ) AS IMAGE_PATH , A.FAIR_STS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('FAIR_STS_CD', A.FAIR_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_STS_NM , FN_GET_ADDR_NM(SUBSTR(A.ADDR_FULL_CD,1,3), '2', #{langCd}) AS ADDR_NM , FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{condUserSeq}, 'BCT0000000002', A.FAIR_SEQ) AS BKMK_SEQ , A.BKMK_CNT FROM CPES_FAIR_MST A
ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
mapper.sql: WHERE A.EDU_DIV_CD = 'EDC0000000002' AND A.JC_AGREE_STS_CD = 'JAS0000000001' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND ( A.EDU_TRNNG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR A.EDU_TRNNG_KEYWORD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR B.INSTT_NM_KH LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR B.INSTT_NM_EN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') )
mapper.select: /*integrated.selectIntegratedSearchTrainingProgramListCnt*/ SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_INSTT B ON B.INSTT_SEQ = A.INSTT_SEQ AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'

/*integrated.selectIntegratedSearchTrainingProgramList*/ SELECT A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ , A.EDU_TRNNG_NM , A.INSTT_SEQ , A.TUITION , A.PROGRAM_CERT_NUM , A.TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD', A.TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD, #{langCd}) AS TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_NM , A.FREE_PAID_YN , A.RECRUMT_STS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('RECRUMT_STS_CD', A.RECRUMT_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS RECRUMT_STS_NM , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.EDU_BGN_DT, #{langCd}) AS EDU_BGN_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.EDU_END_DT, #{langCd}) AS EDU_END_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.RECURMT_BGN_DT, #{langCd}) AS RECURMT_BGN_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.RECURMT_END_DT, #{langCd}) AS RECURMT_END_DT , FN_GET_ADDR_NM(SUBSTR(A.ADDR_FULL_CD,1,3), '2', #{langCd}) AS ADDR_NM , FN_GET_NEW_YN(A.REG_DT) AS NEW_YN , A.BKMK_CNT , FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{condUserSeq}, 'BCT0000000004', A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ) AS BKMK_SEQ , FN_GET_FILE_PATH(B.INSTT_LOGO_FILE_GRP_SEQ) AS FILE_PATH , C.SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD', C.SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD, #{langCd}) AS SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_NM FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_INSTT B ON B.INSTT_SEQ = A.INSTT_SEQ AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN CPES_EDU_TRNNG_SUB C ON C.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ
ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
mapper.sql: WHERE A.EDU_DIV_CD = 'EDC0000000001' AND A.JC_AGREE_STS_CD = 'JAS0000000001' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND ( A.EDU_TRNNG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR A.EDU_TRNNG_KEYWORD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') )
mapper.select: /*integrated.selectIntegratedSearchNEATrainingListCnt*/ SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_INSTT B ON B.INSTT_SEQ = A.INSTT_SEQ AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'

/*integrated.selectIntegratedSearchNEATrainingList*/ SELECT A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ , A.EDU_TRNNG_NM , A.INSTT_SEQ , A.TUITION , A.NEA_EDU_DIV_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('NEA_EDU_DIV_CD', A.NEA_EDU_DIV_CD, #{langCd}) AS NEA_EDU_DIV_NM , A.FREE_PAID_YN , A.RECRUMT_STS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('RECRUMT_STS_CD', A.RECRUMT_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS RECRUMT_STS_NM , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.EDU_BGN_DT, #{langCd}) AS EDU_BGN_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.EDU_END_DT, #{langCd}) AS EDU_END_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.RECURMT_BGN_DT, #{langCd}) AS RECURMT_BGN_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.RECURMT_END_DT, #{langCd}) AS RECURMT_END_DT , FN_GET_ADDR_NM(SUBSTR(A.ADDR_FULL_CD,1,3), '2', #{langCd}) AS ADDR_NM , FN_GET_NEW_YN(A.REG_DT) AS NEW_YN , A.BKMK_CNT , FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{condUserSeq}, 'BCT0000000011', A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ) AS BKMK_SEQ , FN_GET_FILE_PATH(B.INSTT_LOGO_FILE_GRP_SEQ) AS FILE_PATH , C.SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD', C.SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD, #{langCd}) AS SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_NM , C.TEACHER_NM_1 , C.RECRUMT_MEMB , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(C.TEACH_DT, #{langCd}) AS TEACH_DT , CONCAT(C.TEACH_BGN_HOUR,':',C.TEACH_BGN_MINUTE,' ',C.TEACH_BGN_AMPM) AS TEACH_BGN_TIME , CONCAT(C.TEACH_END_HOUR,':',C.TEACH_END_MINUTE,' ',C.TEACH_END_AMPM) AS TEACH_END_TIME FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_INSTT B ON B.INSTT_SEQ = A.INSTT_SEQ AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN CPES_EDU_TRNNG_SUB C ON C.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ
ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
mapper.sql: WHERE A.INSTT_STS_CD = 'ITS0000000002' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND ( A.INSTT_NM_KH LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') OR A.INSTT_NM_EN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%') )
mapper.select:
/*integrated.selectIntegratedSearchRelatedInstitutionList*/ SELECT A.INSTT_SEQ , CASE WHEN UPPER(#{langCd}) = 'KH' THEN A.INSTT_NM_KH ELSE A.INSTT_NM_EN END AS INSTT_NM , A.INSTT_CONTENT , A.INSTT_PROFILE , A.INSTT_TYPE_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('INSTT_TYPE_CD', A.INSTT_TYPE_CD, #{langCd}) AS INSTT_TYPE_NM , A.INSTT_WEBSITE , A.INSTT_OFFICE_TEL , A.INSTT_EMAIL , FN_GET_ADDR_NM(SUBSTR(A.INSTT_ADDR_FULL_CD,1,3), '2', #{langCd}) AS ADDR_NM , FN_GET_NEW_YN(A.REG_DT) AS NEW_YN , A.BKMK_CNT , FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{condUserSeq}, 'BCT0000000010', A.INSTT_SEQ) AS BKMK_SEQ FROM CPES_INSTT A
ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
